Message: The user completes the submission of the form

I'm attempting to add users to the account, but it's only giving me the ability to add them as Admin. 

I'd like to add them as Employees

To add users as Employees instead of Admins, you need to follow these steps:
1. Go to Account Management.
2. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization.
3. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
4. Fill in the email address of the new user and select 'Employee' as their organization role.
5. Submit the form.
The new user will receive an email prompting them to create an account and verify their email address. Once verified, they will see your Organization listed under their Account Management tab with Employee access.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to our Account Management Guide here: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
I'm only getting the option to add admins
The user has uploaded an image of a user management interface displaying a list of users and an "Add user to organization" modal.

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble. Let's make sure we're following the correct steps. When you go to Account Management and click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization, you should see an option to select 'Employee' as the organization role when adding a new user. If this option is not appearing, it might be a technical issue. I recommend reaching out to our support team for further assistance.
Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with details about the issue, including screenshots if possible, so they can help resolve this for you.

I understand the issue you're facing. It seems like you might be in the Ad Account section instead of the Organization section. To add users as Employees, make sure you are in the Organization section. Here’s how to do it:
1. Access Account Management.
2. Switch over to the 'Organization' tab (not 'Ad Accounts').
3. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Organization.
4. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
5. Fill in the email address of the new user and select 'Employee' as their organization role.
6. Submit the form.
If you continue to face issues, please refer to our detailed guide here: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).

I'm sorry to hear that you're still having trouble. Let's make sure we're on the right track. Could you please confirm if you are trying to add users to an Organization or an Ad account? This will help me provide more specific instructions.

To edit a web event, follow these steps:
1. Go to your Ad account in Account Management.
2. Click on the 'Events' tab.
3. Find the web event you want to edit and click on it.
4. Make the necessary changes and save them.
If you need more detailed instructions, please refer to our guide here: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
